  <description>
    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_64518be4189cd802e14db71291608cd4bbfac90d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_64518be4189cd802e14db71291608cd4bbfac90d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Function of enzymes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion der Enzyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonction des enzymes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Função dos enzymes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzione degli enzimi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λειτουργία των ενζύμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Función de enzimas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how an enzyme fits with a substrate molecule, forms an enzyme-substrate complex and breaks down the substrate into two product molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enzyme-substrate complex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">product molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substrate molecule</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie Sitze eines Enzyms mit 
einem Substratmolekül, ein kompliziertes Enzym-Substrat bildet und 
bricht hinunter das Substrat in zwei Produktmoleküle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment les équiper des 
enzymes d'une molécule de substrat, forme enzyme/substrate complexe 
et décompose le substrat en deux molécules de produit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como os ajustes de um enzyme 
com uma molécula da carcaça, dão forma a um enzyme-substrate 
complexo e quebra-o abaixo a carcaça em duas moléculas do produto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come le misure degli enzimi 
con una molecola del substrato, forma un enzima-substrato complesso ed
analizza il substrato in due molecole del prodotto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς ένα ένζυμο 
εγκαθιστά με ένα μόριο υποστρωμάτων, διαμορφώνει 
enzyme-substrate σύνθετο και χωρίζει το υπόστρωμα σε δύο μόρια
προϊόντων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo los ajustes de una 
enzima con una molécula del substrato, forman un enzyme-substrate 
complejo y analizan el substrato en dos moléculas del producto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enzym-Substrat Komplex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Produktmoleküle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Substratmolekül</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">complexe d'enzyme/substrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">molécules de produit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">molécule de substrat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">complexo do enzyme-substrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">moléculas do produto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">molécula da carcaça</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">complesso di enzima-substrato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molecole del prodotto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molecola del substrato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">enzyme-substrate σύνθετο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μόρια προϊόντων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μόριο υποστρωμάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">complejo del enzyme-substrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">moléculas del producto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">molécula del substrato</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
